text: Gao Fenglian (born 15 October 1964) is a Chinese judoka. She finished second at the 1988 Summer Olympics, where judo was for women a demonstration sport, in the heavyweight event. At the World Judo Championships she became world champion in 1986, 1987 (2x) and 1989, winning a silver and bronze medal in 1984. She became twice Asian Champion at the Asian Judo Championships in 1985 and in 1988. == References == Category:1964 births Category:Judoka Category:Living people Category:Chinese martial artists
title: Gao Fenglian
